page.title: 17Brighton & Hove Albion
page.content: The club was fomed in 1900 and has played at Goldstone football ground since 1902. The team does quite a lot of training, about 5 mornings and 2 afternoons a week during the season. They also follow a careful diet. At most matches there are about 12,000 supporters who are normally well behaved: hooligans are thrown out. There is a supporters' club and there are individual fan clubs for the players. The colours of the club are blue, white and yellow. The pitch is sown in Cumberland seed, is mown three times a week and is one of the best in England.
